data.description: Create a security image with a random string
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The (so called) "Security Images" are so popular. Most internet
    software use these in their registration screens to block robot
    programs (which may register tons of fake member accounts). This
    module gives you a basic interface to create such an image. The
    final output is the actual graphic data, the mime type of the
    graphic and the created random string.

    The module also has some "styles" that are used to create the
    background of the image.

    See <http://search.cpan.org/~burak/GD-SecurityImage/> for more
    info...
